reviewText: I've yet to fish any of these flies, but I'd give Shane Stalcup a 10 out of 10 for style points on his patterns.  The videos are excellent.  Each procedure is clearly filmed and well-explained.  Additionally, the patterns tend to be simple to tie and extremely realistic...not to mention beautiful.  I was particularly impressed with his film, "Tying with CDC".  Give them a try!  You won't regret the investment.
